de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.gloss

Class GlossOverlapComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasureBase
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasureBase
        • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.LexSemResourceComparator
          • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.gloss.GlossBasedComparator
            • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.gloss.GlossOverlapComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.SimilarityMeasure, de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasure, de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasure

    public class GlossOverlapComparator
extends GlossBasedComparator
    Implements the distance measure by Lesk (1986). The distance between two terms a and b is defined as the number of shared tokens in the glosses of a and b. We normalize this value to fall into (0,1).
    Author:
    zesch
